resources.string:
Home Light Monitoring and Controlling Application 

Version 1.0.0 

This application is about to help the user in controlling and monitoring the home light remotely using the mobile phone. 

This application is created for the purpose of the creator thesis.

Contact Creator 

Nadya Regina Djodjobo (001201500065) 

Information Technology - President University

Double click the image of the room to turn the lamp on. 

Single click the image of the room to turn the lamp off. 

Long click the image of the room to directly to each feature.
